statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy
SELECT product_id, competitor_price, demand_score FROM pricing_strategy WHERE competitor_price > 50
SELECT product_id, competitor_price, price_multiplier FROM pricing_strategy WHERE demand_score < 0.5
SELECT demand_score, competitor_price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE price_multiplier >= 1.2 ORDER BY demand_score DESC
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE product_id = 100
SELECT product_id, competitor_price, demand_score, price_multiplier FROM pricing_strategy WHERE competitor_price > 50 ORDER BY demand_score DESC
SELECT product_id, competitor_price * price_multiplier AS final_price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE product_id = 123
SELECT AVG(competitor_price) AS average_price, MAX(demand_score) AS max_demand FROM pricing_strategy WHERE demand_score > 0.8
SELECT product_id, SUM(competitor_price) + SUM(demand_score) AS total_cost FROM pricing_strategy GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM pricing_strategy
SELECT * FROM competitor_pricing
SELECT id, competitor_price FROM competitor_pricing ORDER BY competitor_price DESC
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) FROM demand_fluctuations GROUP BY product_id
SELECT MAX(demand_level) AS max_demand FROM demand_fluctuations
SELECT * FROM competitor_pricing WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM competitor_pricing WHERE competitor_price > 100 ORDER BY competitor_price DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(competitor_price) AS avg_price FROM competitor_pricing GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(competitor_price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_level) AS total_demand FROM demand_fluctuations GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demand > 100 ORDER BY total_demand DESC
SELECT product_id, competitor_price, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM competitor_pricing WHERE DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') = '2022-03-15'
SELECT * FROM demand_fluctuations WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY demand_level ASC
SELECT * FROM competitor_pricing LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, competitor_price FROM competitor_pricing WHERE competitor_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM demand_fluctuations ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, demand_level FROM demand_fluctuations WHERE demand_level < 5 ORDER BY demand_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, base_price, final_price FROM dynamic_pricing_strategies WHERE base_price <> final_price;
SELECT * FROM competitor_pricing ORDER BY competitor_price DESC, date_updated ASC;
SELECT product_name, demand_level FROM demand_fluctuations WHERE demand_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, base_price, final_price FROM dynamic_pricing_strategies WHERE base_price < final_price;
SELECT product_name, competitor_price FROM competitor_pricing WHERE competitor_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name, strategy_description FROM dynamic_pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitors_pricing ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT competitor_id, price FROM competitors_pricing WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY competitor_id;
SELECT product_id, price, last_updated FROM competitors_pricing WHERE competitor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM demand_fluctuations WHERE effect_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT fluctuation_id, product_id, effect_date FROM demand_fluctuations ORDER BY effect_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM competitors_pricing ORDER BY competitor_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, price FROM competitors_pricing WHERE price < 50;
SELECT competitor_id, product_id, price FROM competitors_pricing WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM competitors_pricing WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT competitor_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM competitors_pricing GROUP BY competitor_id;
SELECT * FROM CompetitorPrices ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT price FROM CompetitorPrices WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT product_id, price FROM CompetitorPrices WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM CompetitorPrices WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT product_id, last_updated FROM CompetitorPrices ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM CompetitorPrices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, price FROM CompetitorPrices WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM CompetitorPrices GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM CompetitorPrices
SELECT * FROM CompetitorPrices WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id
